notes.text:
This update for podofo fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-12983: Fixed a stack overrun (bsc#1099719).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A stack-based buffer over-read in the PdfEncryptMD5Base::ComputeEncryptionKey() function in PdfEncrypt.cpp in PoDoFo 0.9.6-rc1 could be leveraged by remote attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted pdf file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
